name: Hanye Xu GitHub Page
body:
Welcome to my GitHub page! -- Hanye


***

Work Logs:
* 10/6 - 10/14
Finished Weibo login python code. Added verification picture type in function to the code.
* 10/14 - 10/21
Finished Baidu News Search crawler code: get items from Baidu News Search and stored them in csv file with title, time, author, content and url links.
* 10/22 - 10/28
TODO: 
Generating pdf for each news obtained from Baidu News. Probably need a number for each news? 
Finish the keyword list for Baidu News Crawler. Add key word to each news in csv. 
Working on Google News Crawler.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
